title: SOLD: T206 Vic Willis with bat SGC 50 SC Fact 42 350-460 overprint
author: scooter729

posts.post_title: SOLD: T206 Vic Willis with bat SGC 50 SC Fact 42 350-460 overprint
posts.post_content:
Hi,

I am selling the pictured T206 Vic Willis with bat, graded SGC 50, with a Sweet Caporal 350-460 Factory 42 overprint back.  I was happy to recently pick up this card, but alas, I spent more than I should have in the past couple of weeks, and now it must go!

SOLD - THANKS!

PM or email to [url]scooter0729@yahoo.com[/url].  Thanks for looking!
Scott
